A.title: Confirmed Correct Items
A.content: The following test cases passed without any exceptions.

items.name: Visual Layout Integrity
items.description: Primary statements, notes and schedules appear consistently formatted.

items.name: Accounting Policies Relevance
items.description: Policies do not reference non-existent asset classes.

items.name: Currency and Rounding Statement
items.description: Reporting currency and rounding are correctly disclosed.

B.title: Critical Errors
B.content: Critical failures that materially impact the reliability or statutory compliance of the financial statements.

items.name: Arithmetical FS Internal
items.description: Balance Sheet totals do not reconcile.
items.result: Total Assets do not equal Total Equity + Liabilities (difference: 12,450).

items.name: Equity Movements Internal
items.description: Equity movements do not reconcile to reported loss.
items.result: Closing equity does not reconcile with opening equity plus loss for the year.

items.name: Audit Letter - DD1 vs DD2
items.result: DD1 used instead of DD2 for first-year financial statements.

C.title: Disclosure Breaches
C.content: Non-critical issues that require correction or clarification but do not invalidate the statements.

items.name: Notes Reconciliation
items.description: Notes do not agree with primary statements.
items.result: Administrative expenses note differs from Income Statement by 1,200.

items.name: Going Concern Trigger
items.description: Going concern disclosure missing despite losses.
items.result: Loss reported but no material uncertainty paragraph found.

items.name: Missing Accounting Policies
items.result: Revenue recognised in FS but no revenue recognition policy disclosed.

D.title: Reconciliation Tables
D.content: Breakdown of numeric mismatches identified during validation.

E.executive_summary: The financial statements contain critical arithmetic and regulatory issues that must be resolved before approval. Several disclosure and reconciliation issues were also identified. While presentation and comparative consistency are satisfactory, the statements cannot be relied upon in their current form.
